channel.title: Barrows shop code
channel.description:
so ive been asking help on how to make a shop it seems none of them work though..... so can someone make me a barrows shop??? please.
i tried makeing my own but each time i talk to the guy that sells (changed npc's couple of times) nothing happens.

item.title: Barrows shop code
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Yes, and at the end he will have a missing brace if there are no shops after the one he makes. Think about it.

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows shop code
item.dc:creator: @lorenso lorenso
item.description:
@lorenso wrote:

[quote="!Joshua, post:3, topic:311420"][quote author=lorenso link=topic=407856.msg3011800#msg3011800 date=1256846125]
Here, do excactly what i say:
1:Open client.java and search for Zeke u will see something like this: } else if (NPCID == 541) { // Zeke PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 24; // Al-Kharid Scimitar Shop
Uner the last line WanneShop = 24; // Al-Kharid Scimitar Shop press enter u will get a new line to type on, then copy this: } else if (NPCID == 555) { // Shop Keeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; // Barrows store

2:Now, open up shop.cfg and add this:shop = 43 Barrows Armour 2 2 4708 100 4710 100 4712 100 4714 100 4716 100 4718 100 4720 100 4722 100 4724 100 4726 100 4728 100 4730 100 4732 100 4734 100 4736 100 4738 100 4740 100000000 4745 100 4747 100 4749 100 4751 100 4753 100 4755 100 4757 100 4759 100
Save, and compile. Run your server when ur logged in say ::npc 555
If u want it to place it somewhere say shere u want it and i’ll do it for you.
[/quote]
Ugh, you will give him 100 errors.

There must be a closing brace for each opening brace. (The if statements)[/quote]
No, take a look at this, } else if (NPCID == 519) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 26; } else if (NPCID == 541) { // Zeke PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 24; // Al-Kharid Scimitar Shop } else if (NPCID == 555) { // Shop Keeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; // PVP Armour Store } else if (NPCID == 545) { // Dommik PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 25; // Al-Kharid Crafting Shop } else if ((NPCID == 524) || (NPCID == 525)) { // Shop Keeper + Assistant PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 26; // Al-Kharid General Store } else if (NPCID == 542) { // Louie Legs PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 27; // Al-Kharid Legs Shop } else if (NPCID == 544 && q7 == 15) { // Ranael PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 28; // Al-Kharid Skirt Shop
It’s supposed to be like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows shop code
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“lorenso, post:2, topic:311420”]Here, do excactly what i say:
1:Open client.java and search for Zeke u will see something like this: } else if (NPCID == 541) { // Zeke PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 24; // Al-Kharid Scimitar Shop
Uner the last line WanneShop = 24; // Al-Kharid Scimitar Shop press enter u will get a new line to type on, then copy this: } else if (NPCID == 555) { // Shop Keeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; // Barrows store

2:Now, open up shop.cfg and add this:shop = 43 Barrows Armour 2 2 4708 100 4710 100 4712 100 4714 100 4716 100 4718 100 4720 100 4722 100 4724 100 4726 100 4728 100 4730 100 4732 100 4734 100 4736 100 4738 100 4740 100000000 4745 100 4747 100 4749 100 4751 100 4753 100 4755 100 4757 100 4759 100
Save, and compile. Run your server when ur logged in say ::npc 555
If u want it to place it somewhere say shere u want it and i’ll do it for you.[/quote]
Ugh, you will give him 100 errors.

There must be a closing brace for each opening brace. (The if statements)

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows shop code
item.dc:creator: @lorenso lorenso
item.description:
@lorenso wrote:

Here, do excactly what i say:
1:Open client.java and search for Zeke u will see something like this: } else if (NPCID == 541) { // Zeke PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 24; // Al-Kharid Scimitar Shop
Uner the last line WanneShop = 24; // Al-Kharid Scimitar Shop press enter u will get a new line to type on, then copy this: } else if (NPCID == 555) { // Shop Keeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; // Barrows store

2:Now, open up shop.cfg and add this:shop = 43 Barrows Armour 2 2 4708 100 4710 100 4712 100 4714 100 4716 100 4718 100 4720 100 4722 100 4724 100 4726 100 4728 100 4730 100 4732 100 4734 100 4736 100 4738 100 4740 100000000 4745 100 4747 100 4749 100 4751 100 4753 100 4755 100 4757 100 4759 100
Save, and compile. Run your server when ur logged in say ::npc 555
If u want it to place it somewhere say it here u want it and i’ll do it for you.
